About me

Â 

Welcome to my home page. I am a PhD student at School of Statistics, University of Minnesota, Twin Cities.

I am working with Professor Charles Doss on research problems related to nonparametric function estimation, machine learning and data visualization.

Besides my research topics, I am also interested in statistical computing and open source softwares.

In Spring 2018, I am TA for STAT8112 and STAT 8054.

I will join Liberty Mutual Insurance as a Data Science intern in summer 2018.
